original_title: Já que Ninguém me Tira Para Dançar
overview: Conducted from interviews with personalities who lived with Leila Diniz (1945-1972), the documentary is a record of an era and, above all, it rescues the participation in Brazilian culture of the actress who opened the way for the sexual revolution during the dark years of the dictatorship.

production_companies.name: Nova Era Produções de Arte Ltda.

title: Já que Ninguém me Tira Para Dançar
